SummaryEnglish: Dragon Ball Z Abridged is the title of TeamFourStar's abridged series based on the Dragon Ball Z anime. This abridged series is one of the most successful series created in '08-'09 and was featured on That Guy with The Glasses official website. Dragon Ball Z Abridged is a direct parody with most characters and plot lines remaining relatively unchanged.

1.SummaryEnglish: A group of misfit minion aliens visit Earth to plant the Christmas Tree of Might and destroy Christmas once and for all.

2.SummaryEnglish: On the planet Vegeta, a Saiyan warrior; named Bardock gains the ability to see into the future and tries to stop the destruction of his planet, at the hands of the galactic tyrant Frieza.

3.SummaryEnglish: Lord Slug, a bigger crappier King Piccolo, plans to destroy all life on Earth, and the only one who can stop him is Goku!

4.SummaryEnglish: An alien arrives on earth to wipe out the last of the Saiyan race who looks a lot like Freeza, but it turns out....he's Cooler.

5.SummaryEnglish: The continuing adventures of Goku's father Bardock, who traveled through time and met new friends and enemies.

6.SummaryEnglish: In order to wish for immortality and avenge his father, Garlic Jr. collects the dragon balls, kidnapping Goku's son Gohan in the process. Goku, Kami, Piccolo, and Krillin unite to rescue Gohan.

7.TitleEnglish: Cooler 2: The Return of Cooler's Revenge – The Reckoning
7.SummaryEnglish: Cooler has resurrected himself as a robot and is enslaving the people of New Namek. Goku and the gang must help. Also Vegeta gets kicked in the dick.

8.TitleEnglish: Celloween: A Flight Out of Cell

9.SummaryEnglish: In a dark future where the Cyborgs-not-Androids have taken over Earth, Gohan and his student Trunks are the last defense against these deadly killing machines.

10.SummaryEnglish: The death of Dr. Gero at the hands of Androids 17 and 18 prompts the activation of the rejected androids 14, 15, and the deadly Trucker android 13.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Z-Fighters must stop a mad scientist out to capture the strongest body in the world for his master who just wants to fix the world.

12.SummaryEnglish: Prince Vegeta's reckless pride leads the Z Warriors into a battle against an incredibly deadly foe, who holds an incredibly fierce grudge against Goku... for an incredibly stupid reason.

101.TitleEnglish: DragonBall Z Kai Abridged Episode 1: Then Who Was Monkey?

403.SummaryEnglish: This is a parody of the original "Over 9000" joke. Nappa asks what the subscriber count is, Vegeta replies that it is 9010. Vegeta then continues to scream "It's over 8000!!" before crushing his scouter. Nappa says "Vegeta you didn't do it right", Vegeta replies with "Yes I did Nappa. Yes I did." Since "over 8000" is how it is said in the original manga.

KaiserNeko, Lanipator, Takahata101, Ganxingba, Hbi2k, MasakoX, and Megami 33 will all be there, and this year we've got THREE PANELS! TeamFourStar FAQ - We'll be answering all your questions and premiering DragonBall Z: Lord Slug Abridged! TeamFourStar 18+ - We'll be answering ALL of your questions and premierign Hellsing Ultimate Abridged EPISODE 2! TeamFourStar Presents: The Roast of Little Kuriboh - All of TeamFourStar, along with special guests, will be taking their turns roasting the creator of Abridging himself: Little Kuriboh! 18+ Only!

955.TitleEnglish: Dragon Ball GTFS Commentary | Series Wrap-Up

956.TitleEnglish: Home Away From Heck ｜ HFIL Episode 11

1.SummaryEnglish: The episode opens on a peaceful farm when a space pod crashes down onto Earth into a farmer's marijuana patch. Piccolo is interrupted by the alien, who confused him for someone named "Kakarot." At Kame House, the alien arrives and explains to Goku that he is actually part of an alien race called the Saiyans and that they are brothers. Raditz, the Saiyan, requests Goku to join him and destroy everyone on the planet. Goku declines, so Raditz takes Gohan and flies away.

2.TitleEnglish: And They All Lived Happily Ever-- Oh…
2.SummaryEnglish: Piccolo and Goku catch up to Raditz and challenge him to a fight. After he notices they are getting stronger from removing clothing, he begins to get naked until Goku informs him that they are just wearing weighted clothing. Radditz, embarrassed and angered, attacks Piccolo and Goku. Goku dies. Piccolo then grows his arm back and flies off with Gohan.

3.SummaryEnglish: Nappa and Vegeta overhear Master Roshi talking about the dragon balls over Raddit'z scouter. Piccolo tells Gohan that he will train him. In the afterlife, Kami tries to convince Yemma to let Goku travel on Snakeway to King Kai's planet to receive training to battle the Saiyans coming to Earth.

4.SummaryEnglish: Goku runs over Snake Way and falls off into Hell meeting two ogres named Goz & Mez. Goku tricks them into telling him how to escape and get back on Snake Way. On Earth, Kami assigns Mr. Popo to train Earth's warriors. Mr. Popo knocks Krillin off of the look-out when Krillin dares to ask a question.

5.SummaryEnglish: Goku finally reaches the end of Snake Way and jumps over to King Kai's planet. King Kai agrees to train Goku. Vegeta and Nappa stop at planet Arlia to keep Nappa busy. They introduce themselves to the Arlian King, killing all of the elite guards. Vegeta destroys the planet, and they continue their trip to Earth. On Earth, Piccolo begins his training with Gohan. Meanwhile, the superfriends conceder their options in dealing with the Sayians. Superman quickly shoots down Aquaman's plan to use Whales.

6.TitleEnglish: No One Ever Listens to the Magical Dragon
6.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Popo takes the Z-Fighters and teleports them to another dimension. Meanwhile, King Kai promises Goku that he will commence their training. The magical dragon, Shenron, is summoned and brings Goku back to life.

7.TitleEnglish: Saiyans? On My Planet? (It's More Likely Than You Think)
7.SummaryEnglish: Nappa and Vegeta land on Earth and fly off toward the strongest power level. Piccolo senses the approach of the Saiyans as Krillin arrives. Nappa explains to Piccolo that Piccolo is a Namekian. Vegeta decides to plant the Saibamen explaining that each is as powerful as Raditz.

8.SummaryEnglish: At Kame House Master Roshi and Bulma watch on TV as Yamcha is killed by a Saibaman. Nappa steps onto the battle field and attack Tien, removing his hand. Tien escapes, making Nappa think he wants to play tag. Chiaotzu hops onto Nappa's back and uses self-destruct. Chiaotzu's death was in vain, as Nappa has barely a scratch on him. Tien uses a final attack on Nappa, using up all of his energy and causing his death.

9.SummaryEnglish: Gohan attempts to wake up Piccolo, who was knocked unconscious by Nappa. Krillin assures Gohan that his father, Goku will arrive, citing that he's never let them down, but then it cuts to Goku back at Princess Snake's palace eating another huge meal. Snake reminds him that there was something he had to do about Saiyans. Realizing his negligence, Goku rushes right back on Snake Way and continues his way back to Earth.

10.SummaryEnglish: Vegeta's completely overjoyed with his childish, idiotic partner finally dead. However, he still intends to kill everyone on Earth, including Goku and his friends. Goku decides to face Vegeta on his own and instructs Gohan and Krillin to get as far away from the battlefield as possible.

11.SummaryEnglish: Goku requests that he and Vegeta take their fight elsewhere, since fighting on a battleground littered with the corpses of his fallen friends just doesn't feel right. Relocating to a desert, Goku gives Vegeta one opportunity to leave Earth and never return, so no more blood needs to be shed before their fight begins. Vegeta disregards Goku's offer as tripe and belittles him for growing soft from living on the planet for so long.

12.SummaryEnglish: Vegeta rages at having been surpassed by Goku. Vegeta creates an artificial moon and transforms into a giant ape. King Kai tells Goku to use the spirit bomb to defeat Vegeta. Goku begins gathering the energy he needs but forgets to remain well hidden from the Saiyan ape, getting pummeled into the ground instantly...

1.TitleEnglish: Looks Like the Z-Fighters are Blasting Off Again!
1.SummaryEnglish: Now that Vegeta's gone, there's only the small matter of reviving everyone killed in the battle. A task made somewhat harder by Piccolo (and by extension Kami) being dead too. Thankfully (?) Mr. Popo arrives to tell them about Namek, give them a space ship and generally freak everyone out. That sorted, all that's left is for Gohan, Krillian and Bulma to get going. But Chi-Chi has other ideas.

2.TitleEnglish: A Rose By Any Other Namek
2.SummaryEnglish: Gohan, Bulma and Krillian reach Namek! Sorta. Meanwhile, KaiserNeko learns first hand the dangers of editing video for far too long.

3.TitleEnglish: Dr. Briefs Made This Episode In A Cave... WITHABOXOFSCRAPS!
3.SummaryEnglish: Gohan, Bulma and Krillian reach Namek! For Real this time! However, at the same time, Freeza and his men have also made their way there and Freeza has the strength of a hundred Vegetas! (Needless to say, Krillian is scared spit-less) Whilst that's going on Vegeta lands on Namek, quickly disposes of Qui and goes on his own rampage. Finally, Goku recovers and makes his way to Dr. Briefs to get his own Spaceship to get to Namek.

4.SummaryEnglish: Gohan and the Space Duck witness Freeza wiping out a Namekian village in his search for the dragon balls. Meanwhile, on Earth, Goku goes to dr briefs and the Milfs to see about getting some transportation to Namek because.............Krillin

5.SummaryEnglish: After rescuing the sole survivor of Freiza's massacre Gohan and Krillin take flight. Frieza sends one of his best henchmen Dedoria after them, and he is soon hot on their tail when Vegeta appears to intercept him and settle old scores.

6.SummaryEnglish: Vegeta joins the hunt race to collect all the Namekian dragon balls in a brutal fashion by also massacring one of the Namekian villages. Gohan and crew hatch a plan to stop both Frieza and Vegeta form getting the dragon balls and go to the eldest Namek's house to do so. Mena while Vegeta faces off against Zarbon can he keep up his Winning streak?

7.SummaryEnglish: Frieza Sends Zabon to retrieve the knocked out Vegeta. After being captured Vegeta mounts a daring escape and absconds with Frieza's Dragon balls in the process. Krillin flying around like a jackass with his new Dragonball draws both Vegeta and Zarbon out where they face off one last time.

8.TitleEnglish: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad Saiyan
8.SummaryEnglish: After killing Zarbon, Vegeta takes the last dragon ball he needs from Krillin and goes off to retrieve the ball he hid. In route, Vegeta runs into Gohan who has stolen Vegeta's dragon ball but manages to hide it before Vegeta can see. Knowing Vegeta will figure out who took his dragon ball Gohan and Krillin head to Guru's to unlock Gohan's potential. Once Vegeta finds out he was duped he flys into a blind rage and shoots off in pursuit. Just as he and Krillin are about to face off, Guru warns them that Several high power levels are approaching the planet. Knowing this to be Freiza's most elite troop the Ginyu force Vegeta puts aside his quarrel to form an uneasy alliance with Gohan and Krillin to stop the Ginyu's.

9.TitleEnglish: Fear the Arrival!! Salute, Ginyu Force!!
9.SummaryEnglish: The newly formed team three-star race off to try to gather the dragon balls before the Ginyu Force can find them. Unfortunately, their gambit does not pay off and they are forced to fight The Ginyu's. Gohan and Krillin are faced with the formidable Guldo who psychic powers present a considerable threat can they take out this deadly foe?

10.SummaryEnglish: After getting ahead of him, Vegeta disposes of Guldo helping Gohan and Krillin out of a bind. Vegeta then must confront the next challenger Recoom who looks to be one tough customer. The fight turns out to be one of the shows most brutal while also turning into a prime-time wrestling match. Team three-star look to be on their last legs can they hold out until Goku Arrives? Meanwhile, Frieza tries to figure out how to use the dragon balls.

11.TitleEnglish: Stop! Celebrate and Witness, Goku's Back from 100X Fitness!
11.SummaryEnglish: Goku finally arrives and makes it just in time to back up team three star. After giving them all Sensu beans, he proceeds to wipe the floor with the Ginyu force with Jace fleeing to get captain Ginyu. Vegeta becomes a renegade for life.

12.TitleEnglish: The Good, the Bad, and the Purple
12.SummaryEnglish: After Jace retrieves Captain Ginyu, he and Goku come to blows. Vegeta hearing that Freiza has left his ship unguarded mysterious has to use the bathroom.... about a hundred miles away. Frieza arrives at Guru house for technical support on their dragon balls only to confront a very snarky Nail and Guru.

13.SummaryEnglish: When it clear he is losing the fight Captain Ginyu uses his body-switching technique to steal Goku's body. After digging up the dragon balls, Gohan and Krillin are confronted by the newly swapped Captian Ginyu. When Ginyu learns he cannot get the hang of Goku's body he attempts to switch again With disastrous results after Vegeta makes sure he croaks the gang has finally beat the Ginyu force.

14.TitleEnglish: The Best Laid Plans of Saiyans and Namekians
14.SummaryEnglish: Team three-star put Goku in the pod to heal after their battle. Nail finally stops flying with Frieza, claiming the land they are on is his people's sacred battleground. Frieza says it looks the same as everywhere else on the planet. After some racist remarks, Nail attacks him to no effect. Frieza grabs his arm and rips it off. Nail then surprises Frieza by growing it right back. This fight, however, was all a ploy to buy Gohan and Krillin time to summon the dragon Frieza rushes back to stop them but its too late and he is none too happy.

15.TitleEnglish: Nail is Piccolo, and So Can You!
15.SummaryEnglish: The newly revived Piccolo rushes toward the main battle on his way there he spots the dying Nial who convinces him to use their people's secret fusion technique to bolster Piccalo strength. Meanwhile, team three-star struggles against Frieza who even transformed into his stronger second form to show off.

16.SummaryEnglish: Piccolo Arrives and is holding off Frieza in his second form leading Vegeta to have some revelations about power levels. Things change however when Frieza shifts to his third form, and then after playing around with Piccolo finally turns into his final form

17.TitleEnglish: The Saiyan Formerly Known as Prince
17.SummaryEnglish: Frieza who has transformed into his final form fights Vegeta who claims he is a Super Saiyan. Vegeta is badly beaten. Goku recovers and arrives finally meeting Frieza. Frieza then mortally wounds Vegeta.

18.SummaryEnglish: With his final breath, Vegeta tells Goku that Frieza killed their race. The climatic showdown between Frieza and Goku begins.

19.SummaryEnglish: Goku gets beaten up by Frieza so he decides to use the Spirit Bomb. Piccolo steps in to give Goku the time to the Spirit Bomb by fighting Frieza. Frieza gets hit by the attack but survives and kills Krillin, then mortally wounds Piccolo.

20.SummaryEnglish: Following Krillin's death, Frieza laughs and taunts the enraged Goku, who transforms into a Super Saiyan. The dragon is summoned and King Kai wishes for the resurrection of all who were killed by Frieza.

21.SummaryEnglish: Guru briefly revives allowing Dende to thwart Freiza's plan and allow him to transport everyone back to earth other than Frieza and Goku. The fight continues until Frieza decides to borrow one of Krillin's moves that end in disastrous consequences for him

22.SummaryEnglish: With Frieza Badly wounded Goku shows him some kindness only for Frieza to throw it back in his face forcing Goku to finally put an end to him. Namek finally explodes with Goku's survival in question. The Namekians spend a year on earth while waiting for their dragon balls to recharge. Once the dragon is summoned a new Namek is made and old friends are brought back to life.

1.SummaryEnglish: Krillin Sanchez, now Juan for insurance purposes gets a massive payout of money off his death. Shortly after gets a girlfriend named Maron who might be a golddigger. The gang celebrates turtle's 1000th birthday, Lord Popo says no to the whole Garlic Jr. Saga.

2.SummaryEnglish: Vegeta returns to Earth after a long training stint, begins living with Bulma, and gets a change in wardrobe that leaves him tickled pink. Goku screwed up by leaving Frieza alive and now he and his father King Cold have come to earth to seek revenge. Unfortunately, Goku is still making his way back through space, the Z-fighters have gathered to try and stop them. Will they be able to hold out till Goku arrives?

3.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious stranger who appears to be another Super Saiyan shows up and cuts Frieza's and King Cold's time on Earth short. After meeting up with the gang he claims to know where Goku will land in a couple of hours. Who is this mysterious stranger? and how does he know so much?

4.SummaryEnglish: Goku has finally returned to Earth. After he lands, the mysterious stranger named Trunks asks to speak with him in private. During this conversation, Goku( and Piccolo) learn from Trunks that he has come from the future to warn them about a coming danger of monster androids (cyborgs) that kill almost everyone. He tells Goku that shortly beforehand he will die of heart failure and he has also brought medicine to ensure Goku can be there to confront them. There are also some surprising revelations about Trunks heritage

5.SummaryEnglish: Everyone has been training intensely for the past three years to get ready to confront the androids and the prophesied day has finally come. Goku and the gang search South City for the androids the old fashioned way after learning they cannot sense their energy. After Yamcha gets Yamcha'ed when finally finding the androids the gang convince the androids to take their fight out to a wasteland Piccalo conveniently knows about. Something about Goku also seems off; he did take the medicine right?

6.SummaryEnglish: Goku's Super Saiyan form was an unexpected variable for the androids, and he is taking them to the cleaners. Unfortunately, it turns out Goku was not taking his medicine and collapses, grape flavored go figure. Things are looking grim when Vegeta reappears. Has his training paid off this time?

7.SummaryEnglish: After Vegeta utterly dismantles android 19, Android 20 flees, and everyone else takes off in pursuit. The two parties play a game of cat and mouse. Trunk's has finally returned and joins the fray only to reveal some shocking information on the androids

8.TitleEnglish: Dr. Gero or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Androids
8.SummaryEnglish: After shooting down Bulma's air car, Android 20 gets away. Bulma reveals that Android 20 was actually Dr. Gero the creator of the androids and gives them Gero lab location. The Z-fighters take off in pursuit again to stop Gero before he can activate the "REAL" androids. Will they stop Gero in time?

9.SummaryEnglish: Dr. Gero has managed to activate the androids, but it turns out they were not to keen on being under his thumb and kill him. Also, there was another android named 16 who's sole purpose is murdering Goku. After agreeing that sounds fun, the androids begin their quest of tracking Goku down. The Z-fighters and the androids face off for real this time. Will they be able to defeat them?

10.SummaryEnglish: The androids utterly defeat the Z-fighters except for Krillin................ he gets kissed by the cute one. In the wake of their defeat, everyone contemplates what do next. Piccolo goes off to see if Kami will fuse back with him

11.SummaryEnglish: The androids take a pit stop in their quest to kill Goku to acquire a car. Krillin and the gang move Goku to the literal second place the androids will look; Kame House. On the Z-fighters way to Kame House Bulma sends some concerning information.

12.TitleEnglish: Fear and Loathing in Ginger Town
12.SummaryEnglish: Android 18 stops to get some new clothes. Gohan, Trunks, and Bulma investigate the site of a strange company vehicle and find another time machine that seems to be identical to Trunks. What is going on here? After Piccolo fuses he goes to investigate a disturbance in ginger town. What he finds is a ghost town with nothing but clothes strewn about. Who could have done this?

13.SummaryEnglish: Piccolo faces off against the sinister Cell A bio-mechanical android form the future hell-bent on achieving his perfection who drinks people. Can Piccolo survive this deadly new foe? And what does Cell mean by perfection?

14.SummaryEnglish: After Cell Escapes Piccolo and Tien pursue his trial while Krillin and Trunks go back to Dr. Gero's lab ruins to try and find his secret lab and destroy it. Meanwhile, Cell's carnage spreads to Nickytown

15.SummaryEnglish: Goku finally wakes up after an extended fight with his illness; Feeling the need for more training to take on the androids Goku decides to gather the Saiyans and take them to the lookout to train. In order to convince Chi-chi to allow him to take Gohan along he makes a deal with the devil. After also collecting Vegeta and Trunks Goku heads to the lookout to get permission to train in the hyperbolic time chamber a unique space where time slows down so someone can get a year's worth of training in a day. The only catch is that only two people can go in at a time, Vegeta and Trunks head in first. Meanwhile, the androids having found Goku's house deserted fly over to Kame House only to find Piccolo. Frustrated they demand Goku's location, but Piccolo refuses, and they take their fight over to a series of uninhabited islands.

16.SummaryEnglish: Piccolo and 17 face off. Unfortunately, their fight draws out an unwelcome guest.

17.SummaryEnglish: Cell crashes the androids and Piccalo's party. Krillin speeds off to retrieve the androids detonator, and Tien goes to help Piccolo. After Piccolo is put out of Commission by Cell Android 16 has to step up to stop Cell from absorbing the androids. Can he stop Cell?

18.SummaryEnglish: After Cell absorbs Android 17 things seem dire for 16 and 18, but Tien arrives and puts his life on the line to buy time for them to get away. Now that Cell is stronger than ever can Tien hold the line?

19.SummaryEnglish: After Goku gets back from rescuing Tien and Piccolo Trunks and Vegeta come out of the time chamber and head after Cell who is destroying all the surrounding islands in his search for the androids. Will their training be enough to defeat Cell?

20.SummaryEnglish: Goku and Gohan begin their training in the time chamber. Meanwhile, Vegeta's new power allows him to bulldoze Cell and it seems like all is lost for Cell, but will Vegeta's hubris be his downfall?

21.SummaryEnglish: Turns out leaving the task of resolving things to Vegeta and Krillin might be asking a bit much find who screws this up and allows Cell to achieve his perfect form.

22.SummaryEnglish: This time on Dragonball Z Abridged. Cell has achieved his Perfect form, and Vegeta finally gets the challenge he deserves! Will Goku and Gohan make it out of the Hyperbolic Time Chamber in time to fix everything?

23.SummaryEnglish: This time on Dragonball Z Abridged. Cell has achieved his Perfect form, and Vegeta finally gets the challenge he deserves! Will Goku and Gohan make it out of the Hyperbolic Time Chamber in time to fix everything?

24.SummaryEnglish: The #CellGames are on their way. Trunks struggles to come to terms with Cell's power level and the Gang gathers to hear what Cell has in store. Will Goku and Gohan ever make it out of the Hyperbolic Time Chamber? Find out in Dragonball Z Abridged

25.TitleEnglish: It's Been A Year If It's Been A Day
25.SummaryEnglish: Goku and Gohan have finally come out of the hyperbolic lion tamer and try and get a read on the current situation. Goku goes to measure up Cell before the tournament. Also, Goku debts to his hot Asian wife finally come to term...........will Goku survive?

26.TitleEnglish: Deities, Devils, and Doing the Dirty
26.SummaryEnglish: Goku deals with Chichi as the world searches for a new Kami.

27.SummaryEnglish: It's the start of the Cell Games! Goku steps up to the plate to take the first bout, but another challenger has called dibs!

28.SummaryEnglish: The Cell Games heat up as Goku steps into the ring.

29.SummaryEnglish: Blink and you'll miss the action as Goku and Cell turn up the heat! But Goku's got a surprise... for everyone!

30.SummaryEnglish: Gohan stars in a million Linkin Park Music Videos.

31.SummaryEnglish: Red Flag Gohan disposes of all of the Cell Jr's and hands Cell his ass by laying down a smackdown to remember until he pulls a Vegeta and allows Cell to activate his last resort bomb. Goku is forced to sacrifice himself in order to clean up his mess but is this really the end of the dasterly Cell? Find out.........now NO!

32.SummaryEnglish: The revived and even more powerful Cell Clash's with Gohan one more time for a climactic showdown that will determine the fate of the Earth!

33.SummaryEnglish: Trunk's returns to the future to put an end to all of Dr. Gero's machinations once and for all.
